بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
ڤدپپــك يا اطال أبا الله بكر پڤأك پدڤع الى حسن إلڤراس ما ڤپلك
من الثّياب للزّبون البزيون وهي أربعة وخرقة
لترد على صاحبها إن شا اللّه وإنّك فإنّك غد تدفع إلى صاحب
الثّوب الّذي بلّغك بلغك ثمنه إن شا اللّه
حسبنا اللّه ونعم الوكيل

In the name of God the merciful and compassionate.
... die bei Dir befindlichen [May I be made your ransom,] God prolong your life. Give to Ḥasan the attendant the cloth you owe May I be made your ransom - May God prolong your life! Give to Hasan the attendant the cloth you owe
Brokatkleider... to the costumer, that is four (lengths) and a small piece,
so that they may be returned to their owner, God willing. Tomorrow deliver (it) to the owner of so that they may be returned to their owner, God willing. Tomorrow deliver to the owner of ... und morgen sollst du dem Eigentümer
des Gewandes, das Du erhalten hast, den Kaufpreis aushändigen. the cloth, who has conveyed its price to you.
